## Final regression model


```{block, type='BlackBold'}
LTIME = +0.2663 * CARVOLUME + 0.6984 * LLENGTH + 0.0203 * LPOP + 0.0605 * TWOWAY + 0.1681 * SCHOOL + 0.0317 * RESIDENTIAL - 0.5497
```
